data.name: Hello Goodboy
data.detailed_description:
Hello Goodboy is a heartwarming, wholesome adventure featuring Iiko, a boy new to the afterlife. With no memory of what brought him to the world beyond, he must rely on Coco, a strangely familiar dog who will help him solve the mysteries of this new existence.

Journey through unknown, yet familiar places, meeting fellow souls on their own adventures through the afterlife. Pay it forward with generous favors for them and try to figure out just why Iiko landed in the land beyond to begin with. However, mind the time: there's only so much of it!



  • Craft a personal fairy tale atmosphere and a heartwarming story, as Iiko and Coco make their way through the afterlife.
  • Unravel many mysteries, collect bundles of joy, and give endless bellyrubs to Coco along the way!



  • Befriend the dozens of denizens in the afterlife like a lonely child, an anxious couple, an overworked lumberjack, among others.
  • Everyone has a story to tell and a task Iiko can help with.
  • Help them deal with problems, and afterwards, break out the comfort food and relax together.



  • Choose who you spend time with, as visiting some will prevent you from making relationships with others, and discover how your choices will affect Liko's story through multiple endings.



  • Coco is the closest friend in the afterlife anyone could ask for - also the best of boys! -His nose combined with Iiko's fixing skills will be key to discovering the metaphysical mysteries found around the world beyond - but only if Coco knows he's a very, very good boy.
  • Pamper him with bellyrubs and playing with toys to keep his “Goodboy-o-meter” full and fulfilled.
data.about_the_game:
Hello Goodboy is a heartwarming, wholesome adventure featuring Iiko, a boy new to the afterlife. With no memory of what brought him to the world beyond, he must rely on Coco, a strangely familiar dog who will help him solve the mysteries of this new existence.

  • Pamper him with bellyrubs and playing with toys to keep his “Goodboy-o-meter” full and fulfilled.
data.short_description: A wholesome, non-linear adventure game, where a lost soul and his dog set out on an otherworldly trek through the afterlife. Pass into the world beyond, commit acts of kindness for other souls, and mend mistakes from a forgotten past life. All with a very good boy by your side!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
